instruction: I am managing records for Joao Teixeira (player_api_id=488140). Please update his height to 180 and his weight to 162 in the Player table. Also, for all Player_Attributes records where player_api_id=488140 and date >= '2015-01-01', update these records to have height=180 and weight=162.

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Player WHERE player_api_id = 488140 AND player_name = 'Joao Teixeira';
UPDATE Player SET height = 180, weight = 162 WHERE player_api_id = 488140;
UPDATE Player_Attributes SET height = 180, weight = 162 WHERE player_api_id = 488140 AND date >= '2015-01-01';

instruction: You are Erik Voss, a football coach focused on physical conditioning. For the 2014/2015 season, you want to review all defenders (center backs and fullbacks, specifically: home_player_3, home_player_4, home_player_5 for center and full backs) who played as a home team member for team_api_id=8277. For each, get their player_api_id and birthday from the Player table. For every defender with a birthday after '1990-01-01', increase their weight in the Player table by 3kg. (All parameters: team_api_id=8277, season='2014/2015', relevant positions: home_player_3, home_player_4, home_player_5, birthday cutoff='1990-01-01', weight increase=3kg).

actions.sql: SELECT home_player_3, home_player_4, home_player_5 FROM Match WHERE home_team_api_id=8277 AND season='2014/2015';
SELECT player_api_id, birthday, weight FROM Player WHERE player_api_id IN ([list_of_player_api_ids_from_previous_step]);
UPDATE Player SET weight = weight + 3 WHERE player_api_id IN ([eligible_player_api_ids_born_after_1990_01_01]);

instruction: As a sports analyst, I need to examine Cristiano Ronaldo's disciplinary record during the 2010/2011 season (player_api_id = 30893). First, list all matches from that season in which he received a yellow card, showing the match_api_id and the elapsed minute the yellow card was issued. Then, update his weight in the Player table from the current value to 181 (i.e., current weight 176 + 5 kg as a mock penalty), with player_api_id = 30893. Finally, confirm his new weight in the Player table.

actions.sql: SELECT m.match_api_id, json_extract(value, '$.elapsed') as yellow_card_minute FROM Match m, json_each(m.card, '$.value') WHERE m.season = '2010/2011' AND json_extract(value, '$.card_type') = 'y' AND json_extract(value, '$.player1') = 30893;
UPDATE Player SET weight = 181 WHERE player_api_id = 30893;
SELECT weight FROM Player WHERE player_api_id = 30893;

instruction: For GDPR compliance, I require anonymization for the retired player Filip Luksik. Specifically, for player_api_id 118346 and player_fifa_api_id 185009, please set player_name, birthday, height, and weight in the Player table to NULL, and replace his name wherever it appears in match_view with 'Anonymous'.

actions.sql: UPDATE Player SET player_name = NULL, birthday = NULL, height = NULL, weight = NULL WHERE player_api_id = 118346 AND player_fifa_api_id = 185009;
UPDATE match_view SET home_gk = 'Anonymous' WHERE home_gk = 'Filip Luksik';
UPDATE match_view SET away_gk = 'Anonymous' WHERE away_gk = 'Filip Luksik';
UPDATE match_view SET home_center_back_1 = 'Anonymous' WHERE home_center_back_1 = 'Filip Luksik';

UPDATE match_view SET away_center_back_1 = 'Anonymous' WHERE away_center_back_1 = 'Filip Luksik';

instruction: I am the data manager for the league. I need to update Adrien Rabiot (player_api_id 352879, player_fifa_api_id 210008) after his annual medical. First, insert a new record in the Player_Attributes table for him with these details: id 18888, date '2024-06-10', overall_rating 81, potential 87, preferred_foot 'Left', attacking_work_rate 'High', defensive_work_rate 'Medium', crossing 79, finishing 74, heading_accuracy 65, short_passing 84, volleys 66, dribbling 82, curve 77, free_kick_accuracy 70, long_passing 83, ball_control 85, acceleration 78, sprint_speed 80, agility 76, reactions 79, balance 78, shot_power 83, jumping 79, stamina 88, strength 76, long_shots 74, aggression 82, interceptions 78, positioning 79, vision 82, penalties 69, marking 67, standing_tackle 80, sliding_tackle 77, gk_diving 10, gk_handling 11, gk_kicking 13, gk_positioning 9, gk_reflexes 12. Then, update his official height and weight in the Player table to height 189 (cm) and weight 164 (lbs).

actions.sql: SELECT * FROM Player WHERE player_api_id = 352879 AND player_name = 'Adrien Rabiot';

INSERT INTO Player_Attributes (id, player_fifa_api_id, player_api_id, date, overall_rating, potential, preferred_foot, attacking_work_rate, defensive_work_rate, crossing, finishing, heading_accuracy, short_passing, volleys, dribbling, curve, free_kick_accuracy, long_passing, ball_control, acceleration, sprint_speed, agility, reactions, balance, shot_power, jumping, stamina, strength, long_shots, aggression, interceptions, positioning, vision, penalties, marking, standing_tackle, sliding_tackle, gk_diving, gk_handling, gk_kicking, gk_positioning, gk_reflexes) VALUES (18888, 210008, 352879, '2024-06-10', 81, 87, 'Left', 'High', 'Medium', 79, 74, 65, 84, 66, 82, 77, 70, 83, 85, 78, 80, 76, 79, 78, 83, 79, 88, 76, 74, 82, 78, 79, 82, 69, 67, 80, 77, 10, 11, 13, 9, 12);
UPDATE Player SET height = 189, weight = 164 WHERE player_api_id = 352879;

instruction: Update Wahbi Khazri's height and weight in Player table for player_api_id=166019 and player_fifa_api_id=194845 to height=184, weight=170, and record this in audit_log with details as specified.

actions.sql: UPDATE Player SET height=184, weight=170 WHERE player_api_id=166019 AND player_fifa_api_id=194845;
INSERT INTO audit_log (table_modified, record_id, user, change_type, change_details) VALUES ('Player', 166019, 'Malik Leroy', 'update', 'height:184,weight:170');

instruction: You are the team coach. You want to update the attributes for player Glenn Murray (player_api_id: 35523, player_fifa_api_id: 172937). Specifically, set his heading_accuracy to 88 and overall_rating to 80, with the entry dated '2016-04-01'. After making this change, retrieve all Player_Attributes entries for player_api_id 35523 to verify that the update has been applied. Use only these explicit values and fields.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Player_Attributes (player_api_id, player_fifa_api_id, date, heading_accuracy, overall_rating) VALUES (35523, 172937, '2016-04-01', 88, 80) ON CONFLICT(player_api_id, date) DO UPDATE SET heading_accuracy=88, overall_rating=80;
SELECT id, player_fifa_api_id, player_api_id, date, heading_accuracy, overall_rating FROM Player_Attributes WHERE player_api_id=35523 ORDER BY date DESC;

error_info: Error: ON CONFLICT clause does not match any PRIMARY KEY or UNIQUE constraint

instruction: My name is Thomas Riley, a statistician. Please (1) add a yellow card for Seamus Coleman (player_api_id=77690) in match_api_id=1724277 at the 90th minute, card_type='y', reason='unsporting_behavior'; (2) remove the red card assigned to Diniyar Bilyaletdinov (player_api_id=10491) in match_api_id=840221; (3) For Steven Naismith (player_api_id=23954), in match_api_id=840221 at minute=62, update his yellow card event to change the reason to 'reckless tackle'. Please confirm each operation.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO card (match_api_id, player_api_id, minute, card_type, reason) VALUES (1724277, 77690, 90, 'y', 'unsporting_behavior');
DELETE FROM card WHERE match_api_id=840221 AND player_api_id=10491 AND card_type='r';
UPDATE card SET reason='reckless tackle' WHERE match_api_id=840221 AND player_api_id=23954 AND minute=62 AND card_type='y';

instruction: You are a football club analyst. After reviewing the 2014/2015 season, you noticed that player 'Sebastien Haller' (player_api_id: 352968, player_fifa_api_id: 205693, birthday: 1994-06-22, height: 190.5, weight: 194) scored a decisive goal in Match (match_api_id: 1712513) for his away team (team_api_id: 9908) against home team (team_api_id: 9761) on 2014-11-29. His overall_rating for the date '2014-11-29' is missing from Player_Attributes. Please insert a new Player_Attributes row for this player with these values: id: 99999, player_fifa_api_id: 205693, player_api_id: 352968, date: '2014-11-29', overall_rating: 82, potential: 88, preferred_foot: 'Right', attacking_work_rate: 'High', defensive_work_rate: 'Medium', crossing: 67, finishing: 84, heading_accuracy: 78, short_passing: 75, volleys: 76, dribbling: 80, curve: 68, free_kick_accuracy: 62, long_passing: 72, ball_control: 80, acceleration: 77, sprint_speed: 82, agility: 75, reactions: 79, balance: 73, shot_power: 85, jumping: 82, stamina: 80, strength: 87, long_shots: 77, aggression: 72, interceptions: 60, positioning: 81, vision: 70, penalties: 73, marking: 58, standing_tackle: 65, sliding_tackle: 63, gk_diving: 10, gk_handling: 12, gk_kicking: 9, gk_positioning: 13, gk_reflexes: 14. Then, confirm the row was inserted by querying all Player_Attributes with player_api_id 352968 and date '2014-11-29'.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Player_Attributes (id, player_fifa_api_id, player_api_id, date, overall_rating, potential, preferred_foot, attacking_work_rate, defensive_work_rate, crossing, finishing, heading_accuracy, short_passing, volleys, dribbling, curve, free_kick_accuracy, long_passing, ball_control, acceleration, sprint_speed, agility, reactions, balance, shot_power, jumping, stamina, strength, long_shots, aggression, interceptions, positioning, vision, penalties, marking, standing_tackle, sliding_tackle, gk_diving, gk_handling, gk_kicking, gk_positioning, gk_reflexes) VALUES (99999, 205693, 352968, '2014-11-29', 82, 88, 'Right', 'High', 'Medium', 67, 84, 78, 75, 76, 80, 68, 62, 72, 80, 77, 82, 75, 79, 73, 85, 82, 80, 87, 77, 72, 60, 81, 70, 73, 58, 65, 63, 10, 12, 9, 13, 14);
SELECT * FROM Player_Attributes WHERE player_api_id = 352968 AND date = '2014-11-29';

instruction: As Lukas Baer, I want to update the profile of Anatole Ngamukol (player_api_id=118359): set his height to 180 and weight to 156. Then, list all matches from season '2012/2013' where he played, indicating his player_api_id and position column for each such match, searching both home_player_1..11 and away_player_1..11 fields for his involvement.

actions.sql: UPDATE Player SET height = 180, weight = 156 WHERE player_api_id = 118359;

SELECT match_api_id, season, 'home' AS team, 'home_player_1' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND home_player_1 = 118359 UNION ALLSELECT match_api_id, season, 'home' AS team, 'home_player_2' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND home_player_2 = 118359 UNION ALLSELECT match_api_id, season, 'home' AS team, 'home_player_3' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND home_player_3 = 118359 UNION ALLSELECT match_api_id, season, 'home' AS team, 'home_player_4' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND home_player_4 = 118359 UNION season = '2012/2013' AND home_player_11 = 118359 UNION ALLSELECT match_api_id, season, 'away' AS team, 'away_player_1' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND away_player_1 = 118359 UNION ALLSELECT match_api_id, season, 'away' AS team, 'away_player_2' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND away_player_2 = 118359 UNION ALLSELECT match_api_id, season, 'away' AS team, 'away_player_11' AS position FROM Match WHERE season = '2012/2013' AND away_player_11 = 118359;

instruction: You are Oliver Grant, and you want to insert a new simulated Match record to document a hypothetical scenario where Kieran Richardson (player_api_id: 30352) is the home team's left back (home_player_5) for team_api_id 8472 in a friendly on 2017-07-10. The match has country_id=1729, league_id=1729, season='2017/2018', stage=1, date='2017-07-10 00:00:00', match_api_id=9999999, home_team_api_id=8472, away_team_api_id=8650, home_team_goal=2, away_team_goal=1. Home lineup: home_player_1=32562, home_player_2=38836, home_player_3=24446, home_player_4=24408, home_player_5=30352, home_player_6=38802, home_player_7=24655, home_player_8=24411, home_player_9=17866, home_player_10=23927, home_player_11=24410. Away lineup: away_player_1=30660, away_player_2=37442, away_player_3=30617, away_player_4=24134, away_player_5=414792, away_player_6=37139, away_player_7=30618, away_player_8=40701, away_player_9=24800, away_player_10=24635, away_player_11=30853. Set NULL for goal, shoton, shotoff, foulcommit, card, cross, corner, possession, and all betting odds columns. Insert this new match into the Match table.

actions.sql: INSERT INTO Match (country_id, league_id, season, stage, date, match_api_id, home_team_api_id, away_team_api_id, home_team_goal, away_team_goal, home_player_1, home_player_2, home_player_3, home_player_4, home_player_5, home_player_6, home_player_7, home_player_8, home_player_9, home_player_10, home_player_11, away_player_1, away_player_2, away_player_3, away_player_4, away_player_5, away_player_6, away_player_7, away_player_8, away_player_9, away_player_10, away_player_11, goal, shoton, shotoff, foulcommit, card, cross, corner, possession, B365H, B365D, B365A, BWH, BWD, BWA, IWH, IWD, IWA, LBH, LBD, LBA, PSH, PSD, PSA, WHH, WHD, WHA, SJH, SJD, SJA, VCH, VCD, VCA, GBH, GBD, GBA, BSH, BSD, BSA) VALUES (1729, 1729, '2017/2018', 1, '2017-07-10 00:00:00', 9999999, 8472, 8650, 2, 1, 32562, 38836, 24446, 24408, 30352, 38802, 24655, 24411, 17866, 23927, 24410, 30660, 37442, 30617, 24134, 414792, 37139, 30618, 40701, 24800, 24635, 30853, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)

instruction: You are reviewing the player data for Haouliais Axel Cedric Konan, whose player_api_id is 39633. You have determined that his correct birthday is '1983-02-01 00:00:00' (was originally '1983-01-25 00:00:00'). Please update the Player table so that player_api_id 39633 has birthday '1983-02-01 00:00:00'. Then, find all matches in the Match table from the 2009/2010 season where he appeared as home_player_6 or away_player_6 (i.e., home_player_6 = 39633 or away_player_6 = 39633), and for each such match, insert the match_api_id into the match_review table with flag_reason set to 'Birthday corrected, review player identity'.

actions.sql: UPDATE Player SET birthday = '1983-02-01 00:00:00' WHERE player_api_id = 39633;
SELECT match_api_id FROM Match WHERE season = '2009/2010' AND (home_player_6 = 39633 OR away_player_6 = 39633);
INSERT INTO match_review (match_api_id, flag_reason) VALUES (?, 'Birthday corrected, review player identity');
